Created an attachment (id=28588)
WSDL and XSD files

Need to debug this a bit more to understand why it this only happening with 
this test case.

I can reproduce this on M8 as well. 
Windows 2000
rad_win32-20051019_2150.zip
jakarta-tomcat-5.0.28
New workspace
Create - Dynamic Web Project -  Target Runtime is Tomcat V5.0
Create new server - Tomcat V5.0
Import attached t2.wsdl into Web Content folder
Generate java bean skeleton 
Choose to generate proxy & test
go to Server startup page - choose to Start Server
get the following exception:

Could not publish to the server.
    java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
    at java.util.AbstractList.add(AbstractList.java:164)
    at java.util.AbstractList.add(AbstractList.java:102)

The problem occurs with bottom up as well once you have encountered it in the
top down case in the same workspace.

Workaround - in a clean workspace generate a web service bottom up first with
something simple like and Echo.java.  After that you can get through the top
down scenario including the publish step without encountering the exception.
Can't reproduce this on the I200511090601 M9 build.
Yep.  Can't reproduced on the 1109_1028 driver.  Closing the defect.
